memberdef.name: TRY
memberdef.initializer: try { \ CODE \ } catch (std::exception & e) { \ auto now = std::source_location::current(); \ critlog(now.file_name()); \ std::string lineNumber = std::to_string(now.line()); \ critlog(lineNumber); \ critlog(now.function_name()); \ critlog(e.what()); \ return false; \ }
